import React from "react"; const Form = () => { const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const { name, latitudes, longitudes } = e.target; console.log(name.value, latitudes.value, longitudes.value); const response = await fetch("http://localhost:3001/users", { method: "POST", body: JSON.stringify({ name: name.value, latitudes: latitudes.value, longitudes: longitudes.value, }), headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, }); const data = await response.json(); console.log(data); e.target.reset(); }; return (

Enter your location in latitudes and longitudes in Decimal Degrees(DD)

); }; export default Form;
